solution_line_template: Joseph gave {initial_cards} x {fraction_given_to_brother} = <<{initial_cards}*{fraction_given_to_brother}={cards_given_by_fraction}>>{cards_given_by_fraction} cards to his brother.

He gave a total of {cards_given_by_fraction} + {additional_cards_given_to_brother} = <<{cards_given_by_fraction}+{additional_cards_given_to_brother}={total_cards_given}>>{total_cards_given} cards to his brother and friend.
This is {cards_left}/{initial_cards} x {percentage_multiplier}% = {percentage_left}% of his cards.
